content.text:
[@GCU Prosthetic Conscience](@Yr0KQDRj3y2STr8MKAhSp88JMckaeLNn/dwfaYB64q8=.ed25519) 

Yeah, or we can set up a #dark-crystal style quorum where you can say "when 3 out of these 6 friend block someone, I want them blocked automatically". So many options, but I think we'll likely figure it out as we go. I couldn't agree more though, public pubs may become a growing pain as the network expands.
